channel.title: Confidential Computing on ROP-Lobsters
channel.description: Recent content in Confidential Computing on ROP-Lobsters

item.title: #16: Mike Bursell and Confidential Computing
item.description: ROP-E16: HTML5 Audio ^ We are lucky to be joined by guest Mike Bursell for this episode. Mike is an Executive Director of the Confidential Computing Consortium, and an expert in confidential computing. Join Austin and Nathan as they explore the world of confidential computing, side channel attacks, and even a bit of patent law with Mike.

item.title: #13: DDoSia, Nagoya Ransomware, Confidential Computing and Linux Security
item.description: ROP-E13: HTML5 Audio ^ Join Austin and Nathan on this episode of ROP Lobsters! In this episode they start with a discussion on a botnet with possible Russian ties. They then move on to discuss a push for confidential cloud computing and issues at a Japanese port with Ransomware. The episode wraps up with a rousing discussion of the state of Linux security at-large!
